skills.name: CRUEL DEVICE
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• Reduce Duration of Beneficial Effects on the target by 2 turns.
• Inflict Stop and Shock for 2 turns.
• Damage dealt does not wake targets inflicted with Sleep or Perfect Sleep.

skills.name: CONDEMNATION
desc: • Heal all allies based on their MISSING HP.
• Inflict Smite and Ignite on all enemies for 2 turns.
• Grant Physical and Magic Penetration to all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: BLASPHEMY
desc: Gain Class Advantage against all enemies. Inflict Perfect Silence on all enemies with a 45% Chance to gain an Extra Turn when attacking any enemy inflicted with Smite or Ignite.
